page.title: 02BIOGRAPHY__A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Mum said,"Come on Chez get out of bed." So I got out of bed and had some breakfast.I have got two brothers,they are called Andrew and Allan.They are a lot younger.I said to Mum,"What day is it?""Saturday!""Oh,what shall I do?... I know .... Mum?""What?""Can I ring my friend up?"So I rang up Clare.She said she would come,so I went to meet her on my bike.Clare has got a racer.I met her and we biked back to my house. Then we went to the shop and got some sweets and went the other way round home.By now it was about one o'clock. Soon we had some dinner...an egg sandwich and a bag of crisps.We went out to play,then my friend biked home. We had tea,watched TV and then I went to bed.
